channel.title: Summoning giving me a nulllpointer?
channel.description:
so im getting this nullpointer when i call my pet to me: [code]Loaded clipmap in 40ms. [22-11-14 13:21]: Launching Disturbed... [22-11-14 13:21]: Loaded 1023 doors in 54ms. [22-11-14 13:21]: Loaded 271 Double doors in 9ms. [22-11-14 13:21]: Loaded clipmap in 38ms. [22-11-14 13:21]: Server listening on port 43594 [22-11-14 13:22]: [Logged In]: oliverxd [22-11-14 13:22]: [Logged In]: corpze [22-11-14 13:22]: corpze - actionbutton: 46165 [22-11-14 13:22]: corpze - actionbutton: 66142 [22-11-14 13:22]: java.lang.NullPointerException [22-11-14 13:22]: at server.model.npcs.NPCHandler.dropItems(NPCHandler.jav a:2585) [22-11-14 13:22]: at server.model.npcs.NPCHandler.process(NPCHandler.java: 2314) [22-11-14 13:22]: at server.Server.main(Server.java:185) [22-11-14 13:22]: Saved game for oliverxd. [22-11-14 13:22]: Saved game for corpze. [22-11-14 13:22]: Saving all players... [22-11-14 13:22]: Saving all players... Press any key to continue . . .[/code]
line 2585 is : [code]int dungnpcsremaning = c.dungnpcstokill - c.dungnpcskilled -1;[/code] 2314: [code]dropItems(i); // npc drops items![/code]
What is wrong here?

item.title: Summoning giving me a nulllpointer?
item.dc:creator: @matzie matzie
item.description:
@matzie wrote:

[quote=“Quintorz, post:8, topic:547987”][quote author=matzie link=topic=666893.msg4459576#msg4459576 date=1416865260]
No. Try posting the whole NPCHandler?
[/quote]
http://pastebin.com/kLq6GQ2s[/quote]

run the compiler again and copy your new error and paste that. It looks like you modified your NPCHandler

Read full topic
